title: Restore currency display to USD ($) throughout the app

requirements.summary: Replace all British Pound (£) currency symbols and GBP formatting with US Dollar ($) formatting throughout the frontend
acceptanceCriteria: All product prices on the ProductsPage, ProductCard, and ProductDetailPage display with '$' prefix.
Cart page totals and line-item prices display in USD ($).
Checkout page order summary shows USD ($) amounts.
Admin analytics revenue figures display in USD ($).
Order cards (MyOrderCard, OrderList) show per-line and total amounts in USD ($).
No '£' symbol appears anywhere in the application.

file_operations.description: Replace any £ or GBP currency formatting with USD ($) formatting using en-US locale (e.g., Intl.NumberFormat or manual formatting). Ensure product price displays with $ prefix.
